summary: This is a brief email from an unidentified sender to an FBI agent in New York, referencing the Epstein case. The sender was referred by Attorney Sigrid McCawley and is seeking to arrange a conversation.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Attorney who referred the email sender to the FBI agent. The sender spoke with her the previous day about the Epstein case.

keyFacts: An individual is attempting to contact an FBI agent in New York regarding the Epstein case.
The contact was facilitated by Attorney Sigrid McCawley, indicating legal coordination or a referral.
The communication date is June 18, 2020, placing it after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
